question: As per International Energy Agency (IEA), which country would be the world's biggest oil refiner by 2021?
explanation:
As per the recent statement of the International Energy Agency, China will surpass the United States to become the world's biggest oil refiner in 2021.
The United States has been at the top in the list of oil refiners since the beginning of the oil regime in the mid-nineteenth century. Also, in 1967 the United States possessed over 35 times the refining capacity of China.
